# Model Fit Summary Plots
```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE, eval = TRUE, 
                      results = 'hide', fig.align = 'center')
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())
```
```{r}
library(COVIDCurve)
library(drjacoby)
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
source("R/extra_plotting_functions.R")
```
```{r}
espage <- readRDS("results/ModFits/ESP_age_GTI2.5_rung50_burn10000_smpl10000.RDS")
esprgn <- readRDS("results/ModFits/")

read_process <- function(path) {
  tibble::tibble(
    country = stringr::str_split_fixed(basename(path), "_", n=3)[,1],
    lvl = stringr::str_split_fixed(basename(path), "_", n=3)[,2],
    fit = list(readRDS(path)))
}

plot_par(espage$mcmcout, "spec")
plot_par(espage$mcmcout, "ma10")

COVIDCurve::get_cred_intervals(espage, what = "IFRparams", by_chain = F)




```
